publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1186 Kenny MacAskill: Draft Criminal Procedure (Scotland) Act 1995 Fixed Penalty Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Criminal Procedure (Scotland) Act 1995 Fixed Penalty Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-1186 Kenny MacAskill: Draft Criminal Procedure (Scotland) Act 1995 Fixed Penalty Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Criminal Procedure (Scotland) Act 1995 Fixed Penalty Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
